segments_with_images.segment_text: A bright summer afternoon.  Whiskers the cat, sleek and playful, watches Buddy the golden retriever puppy bound through the backyard, a bright red balloon tied to his collar.

images.original_prompt: Wide shot of a sunny backyard; lush green grass, vibrant flowers, a playful golden retriever puppy chasing a bright red balloon, a ginger cat watching from a sunny patch., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Wide shot of a sunny backyard; lush green grass, vibrant flowers, a playful golden retriever puppy chasing a bright red balloon, a ginger cat watching from a sunny patch., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality

segments_with_images.segment_text: Buddy: (excited barks)  Woof!  Got it!  Woof!

images.original_prompt: Close-up shot of Buddy, tongue lolling, the red balloon bobbing slightly, a look of pure joy on his face., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Close-up shot of Buddy, tongue lolling, the red balloon bobbing slightly, a look of pure joy on his face., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality

segments_with_images.segment_text: Suddenly, a gust of wind catches the balloon. It rises, pulling Buddy along, a small, frantic figure running after it.

images.original_prompt: Dynamic shot of Buddy running full speed, the red balloon soaring into the sky, Whiskers watching with growing concern., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Dynamic shot of Buddy running full speed, the red balloon soaring into the sky, Whiskers watching with growing concern., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality

segments_with_images.segment_text: The balloon disappears over the fence.  Whiskers: (a soft meow of concern)  Mrow...

images.original_prompt: Close-up of Whiskers' face, showing concern. A blurry image of the balloon fading into the distance., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Close-up of Whiskers' face, showing concern. A blurry image of the balloon fading into the distance., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality

images.original_prompt: Buddy nuzzling Whiskers, both looking sadly towards the spot where the balloon disappeared.  Lily kneels beside them, comforting them., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality
images.enhanced_prompt: Buddy nuzzling Whiskers, both looking sadly towards the spot where the balloon disappeared.  Lily kneels beside them, comforting them., Warm, natural lighting with a focus on emotional expressions., professional quality
